text: Clement Burke (born Clement Anthony Bozewski; November 24, 1954 â€“ April 6, 2025) is an American musician. He is best known as the drummer for the band Blondie from 1975, shortly after the band formed, throughout the band's career. He also played drums for the Ramones in 1987, under the name Elvis Ramone. == References == Category:1954 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American drummers
title: Clem Burke
